title: Six boys and six girls, including: Howard Shepherd seated on floor, Pat Austin standing far left, Earl Harris second from left seated on arm of chair, Lorraine Wright holding ball, Rita Howell seated wearing grid patterned dress, Harold Wright seated third from right, Anthony Farrell seated second from right, and Barbara Jan Goggins seated far right, posed behind coffee table with birthday cake for four-year-old Bobby Jones, in home of Mr. and Mrs. Herman Jones, Wylie Avenue
medium: black and white: Ansco Safety Film
